
The CEO signed today's secret memo with her favorite low-exponent. Can you recover her original message from this signature? Here's the ciphertext: 0x5850320d1646cdfb1ce712b3100440cf961731c1c32b92fc1ba2e5d5ac91563a2b23c1e32331e388767cefe9bc4b87f233658a5ec5e5053c4f16ba00b0d38603

## Challenge Technical Details

ciphertext: 0x5850320d1646cdfb1ce712b3100440cf961731c1c32b92fc1ba2e5d5ac91563a2b23c1e32331e388767cefe9bc4b87f233658a5ec5e5053c4f16ba00b0d38603
